DOC.criteria: Healthy male surgically sterile postmenopausal ( last menstrual period > 1 year time enrollment ) healthy female , 1845 year age , inclusive , screen ; Who use tobacco nicotinecontaining product within past 3 month ; Willing abstain caffeine xanthinecontaining beverage , include coffee tea , chocolate , alcohol , grapefruit juice , Seville oranges , 24 hour admission duration study ; Who body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 , inclusive .
